verses.verse: The words <S%H1697><s%> of Amos, <S%H5986><s%> who was among the herdsmen <S%H5349><s%> of Tekoa, <S%H8620><s%> which he saw <S%H2372><s%> concerning Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Uzziah <S%H5818><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Jeroboam <S%H3379><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joash <S%H3101><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> two years <S%H8141><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the earthquake. <S%H7494><s%>

He said: <S%H559><s%> "Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will roar <S%H7580><s%> from Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and utter <S%H5414><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%> from Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> and the pastures <S%H4999><s%> of the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> will mourn, <S%H56><s%> and the top <S%H7218><s%> of Carmel <S%H3760><s%> will wither. <S%H3001><s%>"

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> "For three <S%H7969><s%> transgressions <S%H6588><s%> of Damascus, <S%H1834><s%> yes, <S%H702><s%> for four, I will not turn away <S%H7725><s%> its punishment; <S%H1758><s%> because they have threshed Gilead <S%H1568><s%> with threshing instruments <S%H2742><s%> of iron; <S%H1270><s%>
but I will send <S%H7971><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of Hazael, <S%H2371><s%> and it will devour <S%H398><s%> the palaces <S%H759><s%> of Ben Hadad. <S%H1130><s%>

I will break <S%H7665><s%> the bar <S%H1280><s%> of Damascus, <S%H1834><s%> and cut off <S%H3772><s%> the inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> from the valley <S%H1237><s%> of Aven, <S%H206><s%> and him who holds <S%H8551><s%> the scepter <S%H7626><s%> from the house <S%H1004><s%> of Eden; <S%H5731><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> of Syria <S%H758><s%> shall go into captivity <S%H1540><s%> to Kir, <S%H7024><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> "For three <S%H7969><s%> transgressions <S%H6588><s%> of Gaza, <S%H5804><s%> yes, <S%H702><s%> for four, I will not turn away <S%H7725><s%> its punishment; <S%H1540><s%> because they carried away captive the whole <S%H8003><s%> community, <S%H1546><s%> to deliver them up <S%H5462><s%> to Edom; <S%H123><s%>
but I will send <S%H7971><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> on the wall <S%H2346><s%> of Gaza, <S%H5804><s%> and it will devour <S%H398><s%> its palaces. <S%H759><s%>

I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> the inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> from Ashdod, <S%H795><s%> and him who holds <S%H8551><s%> the scepter <S%H7626><s%> from Ashkelon; <S%H831><s%> and I will turn <S%H7725><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> against Ekron; <S%H6138><s%> and the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> will perish, <S%H6><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> "For three <S%H7969><s%> transgressions <S%H6588><s%> of Tyre, <S%H6865><s%> yes, <S%H702><s%> for four, I will not turn away <S%H7725><s%> its punishment; <S%H5462><s%> because they delivered up the whole <S%H8003><s%> community <S%H1546><s%> to Edom, <S%H123><s%> and didn't <S%H2142><s%> remember the brotherly <S%H251><s%> covenant; <S%H1285><s%>
but I will send <S%H7971><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> on the wall <S%H2346><s%> of Tyre, <S%H6865><s%> and it will devour <S%H398><s%> its palaces. <S%H759><s%>"

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> "For three <S%H7969><s%> transgressions <S%H6588><s%> of Edom, <S%H123><s%> yes, <S%H702><s%> for four, I will not turn away <S%H7725><s%> its punishment; <S%H7291><s%> because he pursued his brother <S%H251><s%> with the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and cast off <S%H7843><s%> all pity, <S%H7356><s%> and his anger <S%H639><s%> raged <S%H2963><s%> continually, <S%H5703><s%> and he kept <S%H8104><s%> his wrath <S%H5678><s%> forever; <S%H5331><s%>
but I will send <S%H7971><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> on Teman, <S%H8487><s%> and it will devour <S%H398><s%> the palaces <S%H759><s%> of Bozrah. <S%H1224><s%>"

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> "For three <S%H7969><s%> transgressions <S%H6588><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> yes, <S%H702><s%> for four, I will not turn away <S%H7725><s%> its punishment; <S%H1234><s%> because they have ripped open the pregnant <S%H2030><s%> women of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> that they may enlarge <S%H7337><s%> their border. <S%H1366><s%>

But I will kindle <S%H3341><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> in the wall <S%H2346><s%> of Rabbah, <S%H7237><s%> and it will devour <S%H398><s%> its palaces, <S%H759><s%> with shouting <S%H8643><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of battle, <S%H4421><s%> with a storm <S%H5591><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the whirlwind; <S%H5492><s%>
and their king <S%H4428><s%> will go <S%H1980><s%> into captivity, <S%H1473><s%> he and his princes <S%H8269><s%> together, <S%H3162><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
